game_description: Use your lightning abilities to strike at the never-ending hordes of Jotunheim as they attempt to destroy Yggdrasil -- the World Tree. You, Thor, are the last hope of Asgard and the realms of the tree you protect. Will you smite your foes with Mjolnir, or succumb to the siege?
